title: Casa Grande Ruins National Monument: From Tucson
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps     From Tucson                Directions From Tucson      Directions from the Tucson Area: Take I-10 West (toward Phoenix) approximately 47 miles to AZ-87 at exit 211b. Continue straight onto the Frontage Road for 1/2 mile.  Stay in the right lane to go North on AZ-87 for 19 miles to Coolidge. Continue through Coolidge about 3 miles and look for the entrance to the monument on your left directly across from Safeway Plaza shopping area on your right. Proceed for 3/4 mile down the entrance road to the parking lot.  Get a PDF version of this map (237K)...  Â     Driving from Tucson to Casa Grande Ruins
